name: Radiation Cleaners
description:
Godot project that I did for the mini jam 76, This is gonna be my first jam and Im kinda excited and scared, the game I am making is about a worker who has to clean radiation from the floor and protect the outside world from the radiation from leaking

The Mini Jam 76 theme is radiation and the limitation is one handed controls

The controls is WASD and Space Bar

Goal:

The players goal is to clean as much of the radiation on the ground as fast as possiable this will give the player points
